item.description:
Location will be the Tri-City Plaza area of Vernon. We'll meet in the parking lot where the Bank of America (formerly Fleet Bank) is at 10:00 a.m., wave signs for an hour or more and then head out to neighborhoods in Vernon.

We have the handouts. We have the yard signs. We have DVD's. We need Ron Paul supporters in the streets getting this material to the uninformed masses.
item.how_to_find_us: I have a silver car with "Ron Paul" on the door. Depending on the turnout, some of us may want to move to the other side of the intersection (on the Denny's side) - look for the signs near Tri-City you'll find us.
item.why: Time is running out! The sign wave spreads awareness and the positive honks and waves are a plus. The literature drop gets the information into the hands of voters and is of the utmost importance.
item.name: Saturday sign wave and lit drop in Vernon
